channel.title: adb on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in adb on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: adb常用命令
item.description: 打开原生launcher页面 1 adb shell am start -n com.android.launcher3/.Launcher 打开一般电视的原生设置 1 adb shell am start com.android.tv.settings/.MainSettings 查看可见的activity，最上层的activity 1 adb shell dumpsys activity |
